The Polish defense company Huta Stalowa Wola has demonstrated its new development-a tower with a new architecture, with an updated recharge mechanism and an innovative ammunition for the modernization of self-propelled 120-mm RAK mortars.

AsinformsThe Building Technology Research Portal, innovation increases the rapid RAK mortar from 6-8 shots per minute up to 12-16 shots. At the same time, the developer was in no hurry to reveal all the features and details of the new tower, according to the Armyinform.

Weapons researchers say that the original design of the RAK mortar was already providing automatic charging, but Huta Stalowa Wola has doubled to increase the number of shots per minute.

The total ammunition of the machine is increased from 48 to 60 shots. This is achieved by reducing the number of crew members of the machine from four to three people, and now only two people - the commander and the driver - can now perform the fire task. The range of fire remained unchanged - up to 12 km.

As your timereportedThe Armyinform, during a visit to Warsaw in April 2023, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky announced that our country and Poland had agreed on a new package of military assistance. In particular, it envisaged the supply of MiG-29 fighters, PIRUN MAS, Rosomak armored personnel carriers, self-propelled mortars and other weapons.

Later, Polish Prime Minister Mateusz Moravetsky added that the delivery of three company sets of mortar SAU RAK for the Armed Forces.

As the defense experts then notedportalDefense Express, such a weapon is exactly what is now needed at the front to reflect the "infantry assaults" of the racists or to support the mechanized parts during the expected counter -offensive of the Defense Forces of Ukraine.

“The RAK mortar is based on the Rosomak armored vehicle chassis, has 120 mm caliber. It takes only 30 seconds to deploy to the position, only 15 seconds for collapse, ”the weapons researchers stated.

In its turn, the ArmyInform has told in detail in one of its publications about the M120 RAK basic model, you can see it for itby reference.
